org.guicebox
Class NamedExecutors

java.lang.Object
  org.guicebox.NamedExecutors

public class NamedExecutors
extends java.lang.Object

Convenience class to get around the annoying feature of Executors that forces you to create a whole ThreadFactory just to give your threads a name.

Author:
willhains

Method Detail

single

public static java.util.concurrent.ThreadFactory single(java.lang.String threadName)
Returns:
a ThreadFactory that produces threads with the specified name.

serial

public static java.util.concurrent.ThreadFactory serial(java.lang.String threadName)
Returns:
a ThreadFactory that produces threads with the specified name, suffixed with a hyphen and a serial number.
